name: florianbelhomme/flob-foundation-bundle
description: Integrates the features of the responsive framework Foundation, from Zurb, into Symfony2 by providing templates, Twig extensions, services and commands.

suggest.knplabs/knp-paginator-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the pagination provided by KnpPaginatorBundle.
suggest.knplabs/knp-menu-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the menus provided by KnpMenuBundle.
suggest.white-october/pagerfanta-bundle: FoundationBundle can styles the pagination provided by PagerFanta.
suggest.florianbelhomme/flob-foundation-demo-bun: Provides you a demo and examples of the features of the foundation bundle.
